key.name: lock-on-suspend
key.description: Lock the screen when the computer is suspended.

key.name: lock-on-screensaver
key.description: Lock on screensaver event. "off" disables, "activate" locks when the screensaver is activated, "deactivate" locks when the screensaver is deactivated.

key.name: lock-after-screensaver
key.description: Lock the screen after the screensaver has been active for this number of seconds.
